meanings.definition: The rank or title of an earl.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the brave knight aspired to attain the earlship one day.
meanings.sent2: The earlship was passed down through generations in the noble family.
meanings.sent3: The villagers celebrated the earlship ceremony with a grand feast.
meanings.sent4: She wore her earlship with grace and dignity, commanding respect from all.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming crown symbolized the earlship's authority and power.

meanings.definition: The territory or jurisdiction of an earl.
meanings.sent1: The earlship encompassed vast lands and villages under its rule.
meanings.sent2: Traveling through the earlship, one could see the beauty of the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children played hide-and-seek in the earlship's forests.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed peacefully through the heart of the earlship, bringing life to all.
meanings.sent5: Birds chirped happily in the earlship, creating a symphony of nature.
